Source.Name: deepin-wm-switcher
Source.Summary: Deepin window manager monitoring and auto-switching service.
Source.Description: Deepin window manager monitoring and auto-switching service. It is capable of monitoring the health of the 3D WM and falling back to 2D if bad things happened, and detecting platform capability and choose 2D/3D WM accordingly.

Package.Name: deepin-wm-switcher
Package.Summary: Deepin window manager monitoring and auto-switching service.
Package.Description: Deepin window manager monitoring and auto-switching service. It is capable of monitoring the health of the 3D WM and falling back to 2D if bad things happened, and detecting platform capability and choose 2D/3D WM accordingly.
